description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The work of Jil Sander, exclusive German fashion designer. Efforts to consolidate East-West unity - meetings between Chancellor Brandt, President Nixon and Mr. Brezhnev. The Hanover Industries Fair as an information source for many branches of technology. A glimpse at the chimney sweeper in modern times. Driven by expert racing drivers, the Porsche performs in the Inter-Series race.
